snippet: President Obama has only occasionally invested time in cultivating relationships with the leaders of other countries.
abstract: White House Memo; lack of any real relationship between Pres Obama and Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu is indicative of Obama's approach with other foreign leaders; his cool, businesslike approach with them leaves him bereft of the kind of sustaining relationships that previous presidents cultivated to help mollify disagreements and receive cooperation.
lead_paragraph: President Obama has only occasionally invested time in cultivating relationships with the leaders of other countries.

headline.print_headline: In Relating to Foreign Leaders, Obama Keeps It Mostly Business
headline.main: In Relating to Foreign Leaders, Obama Keeps It Mostly Business
